DOC.brief_summary: The main objective project assess effect novel supervise exercise intervention overweight pregnant newborn . Methods/Design : The present study Randomized Controlled Trial . Sixty overweight pregnant interested participate intervention program randomly assign either exercise ( 3 sessions/week ) , usual care ( control ) group ( 30 pregnant per group ) . The primary outcome measure maternal weight gain , maternal neonatal glycaemic profile . Secondary outcome measure : ) body composition ; ii ) dietary pattern ; iii ) physical fitness ; iv ) objectively measured physical activity sedentary behaviour ; v ) sleep quality ; vi ) mental health , quality life positive health ; vii ) haematology biochemical analysis ; viii ) oxidative stress ; ix ) pro- anti-inflammatory marker ; x ) bone health biomarkers ; xi ) adiposity-related protein expression . The data analyse intention-to-treat basis per protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise During Gestation Maternal Foetal Health
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Overweight pregnant woman normal pregnancy course . Answer `` '' question PARmedX pregnancy* . To able walk without assistance . To able read write enough . Informed consent : To capable willing provide consent . *In addition , specific inclusion criterion data analysis : gestational age delivery 3742 week single foetus , spontaneous vaginal delivery instrumental vaginal caesarean without maternofoetal pathology ( indication involve maternofoetal risk , disproportion , fail induction , foetal progression noncephalic presentation ) , newborn appropriate weight , Apgar score > 7 1st 5th minute life , cord blood pH ( normal > 7.20 ) normal monitoring result . Exclusion criterion : Acute terminal illness . Malnutrition . Inability conduct test assess physical fitness exercise pregnancy . Underweight , normalweight obesity . Pregnancy risk factor ( hypertension , type 2 diabetes , etc. ) . Multiple pregnancy . Chromosopathy foetal malformation . Uterine growth restriction . Foetal death . Upper low extremity fracture past 3 month . Presence neuromuscular disease drug affect neuromuscular function Be register exercise program Perform 300 minute least moderate physical activity per week Unwillingness either complete study requirement randomise control intervention group .
